TopicTitle: Take on Mars, what do you think about that game

Articles.Content:
I love space games that's why i bought KSP, and spend my teenage years playing Buzz Aldrin Race Into Space for long hours.

What do you think about Take on Mars does there are rocket launch or only mars rover?

There is a thread for this game a bit farther up the list: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/45139-Take-on-Mars Check that one out, Pawel. Meanwhile, this one's redundant, so let's close it, shall we?
